Define all starting parameters for the program by using the equality sign

left side: parameter identifier
right side: value

White space at the start and end of each side are ignored

directory     = ../resources/

width         = 1920
height        = 1080
fullscreen    = True
targetFPS     = 100

defaultName   = Stratege
defaultServer = heidegaming.de

verbose       = True
preloadImages = True
preloadFonts  = True

artifacts     = All
places        = All
monuments     = All
mages         = All
items         = All
scrolls       = All
